def_en: If something rebounds from a solid surface, it bounces or springs back from it.

def_cn: 对…产生反作用，对…产生不良影响（尤指本欲使其发生在别人身上）
def_en: If an action or situation rebounds on you, it has an unpleasant effect on you, especially when this effect was intended for someone else.

def_cn: （结束恋爱关系之后）处于反弹期，在失意之时
def_en: If you say that someone is on the rebound, you mean that they have just ended a relationship with a girlfriend or boyfriend. This often makes them do things they would not normally do.
In basketball, a rebound is a shot which someone catches after it has hit the board behind the basket.
